= Microsoft Reader LIT files

The `.LIT` files in this directory are obtained freely from:
https://at-udl.com/library_bkup/mreader.htm

While there is not explicit license, it is implied that these files are free to use:

[quote]
All Microsoft Reader documents are saved in a *.lit format. The following
books were collected and free downloads from multiple sources.

The site is copyright to Elisa Wern, 2004.
